description: A delicious double cheeseburger with two juicy beef patties, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.
name: Double Cheeseburger

description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil on a thin, crispy crust.
name: Margherita Pizza

description: Fresh sushi roll with crab, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in seaweed and rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.
name: California Roll

description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with tender marinated chicken, aromatic spices, caramelized onions, and fresh herbs.
name: hyderabadi biryani

description: Refreshing salad with crisp cucumbers, ripe tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, tossed with olive oil and oregano.
name: Greek Salad

description: Decadent warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, dusted with powdered sugar and served with vanilla ice cream.
name: Chocolate Lava Cake
